body_html:
Thanks for the detailed response @mrry, and hope that helps @normads!

I'm closing this out, but if you have further issues just reopen this bug. Note that we use github issues primarily for bugs and installation issues; please ask general questions on StackOverflow and tag with the tensorflow tag. Thanks!
